website_summaries.verdict: A brand recommended by our pet expert for its overall quality and very low risk of recalls due to strict quality standards in New Zealand.
pros: A good choice if you worry about food recalls
Free of additives –  limited ingredients (mostly meat, organs, bones and green mussels, which have unique nutritional benefits)
cons: Very expensive, but worth it if you want to serve your furry friend the best
A few picky eaters didn't like it

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST ON THE MARKET
customer_reviews.text: If your cats throw this up, their stomachs need to adjust. Mix it with their old food or dry food first multiple times. It's a very strong, thick formula. This is expensive. But it is the best stuff out there - hands down. HANDS DOWN. And if you care about animals - even better - they treat their animals well and "kill with kindess" or so it seems on their youtube videos and website. I am a vegan and obsessed with with my cats health and I will not feed them anything else. Yes it is expensive but you are losing vet bills years down the road. What's more important?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY LARGE BONE SHARDS
customer_reviews.text: Please listen to me when I say do not buy this food, it contains large amounts of large bone shards that will really hurt your cat and get stuck in their gums and could really hurt them internally... please for the best interest of your kitties stay away from this brand and stay aware
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Best rated food and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This food has come up highly rated on many lists and with good reason. Its ingredients are just what my cat needs and not full of fattening and non-nutritive fillers. My 18 year old cat is thriving eating this and my 11 and 2 year old cats are friskier than ever with shiny, soft fur, clear eyes and fresh breathe. AND I feel good supporting the economy of a country that takes gun violence and the laws needed to control it seriously!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey mowchan

customer_reviews.title: The Lamb flavor did not work for my cats
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this healthy brand. I read such great reviews. My cat has IBS, and I wanted to try a different grain free wet canned food. I previously had him on Wellness, but he didn't eat it consistently. Sometimes, I would have to mix it with tuna. Both my cats tried it a few times, and every time they threw up. I did introduce just a small amount each time, and they ate it every time. But they kept throwing up after. Too bad it didn't work out for my cats, and this brand is so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: mskga22

customer_reviews.title: BEST OPTION OUT THERE
customer_reviews.text: Yes, very pricey. But my two aging persians were having to eat I/D vet digestive food, and now don't! We mix each can with a little bit of Wellness Chicken wet food to extend it, and with a heaping tablespoon of canned organic pumpkin (NOT pumpkin pie blend!) for digestive health (no more diarrhea, ever, and cats LOVE pumpkin). We've tried everything over the years, and since we started using Ziwi a couple of months ago, both cats seem to have become years younger and happier.
customer_reviews.author: Lady_V

customer_reviews.title: High quality, good value, and loved by my cats
customer_reviews.text: We have a cat who is extremely allergic to all poultry products, and finding food to vary her diet is hard. I was very happy to discover this brand, which is all free of chicken products. All of my cats like this food, even the fussy ones. It smells good, too--it smells like real, good-quality meat. It is a little pricey but I find it a good value because it is densely packed and has no gravy or filler. One can will feed all five of my cats.
customer_reviews.author: GreenmanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great cat food
customer_reviews.text: I don't actually love it, but my cats do. The company brand is highly rated with very few if any recalls for quality. That is why I purchased this and other Ziwi Peak brands. The food is not watered down. Just enough water to be palatable and the cats finish it. Poop is less and doesn't smell horrible like from some of the popular brands.My cats look good and healthy (from the kitten to the 5 year old and the old man at 12 years of age). I am very happy with this brand--all the flavor combinations that I can get. Sad that I can only get it through Amazon, not at the pet stores close by.
customer_reviews.author: Cres

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to rate these things, mainly because I am sure someone else's cat may love it. Mine and my roommate's cats are not those, sadly. Unfortunately I can't give much of a positive. In a house of 4 cats, not a single one ate more than a few nibbles before they turned their noses up. The food itself looked great, smelled great, no signs of anything wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: KrakenQueen

customer_reviews.title: Saved my IBD kitty's life - and no more carageenan
customer_reviews.text: Website says "New Improved Recipe with no Carrageenan or Sodium Tripolyphosphate" as of 8/29/15, so ZiwiPeak pays attention to their customers. My kitty has IBD and this is the cleanest cat food I can find (except Hounds & Gatos which is 35% more expensive, or homemade). She's allergic to most commercial cat foods, but she loves this and it stays down. 4 stars only because I'd like a slightly finer grind to break up the bone fragments a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: GinnyinMichigan

customer_reviews.title: Cat no longer diabetic after several months eating this food!
customer_reviews.text: First, the cat LOVES this food, especially the chicken and the hoki flavors. There is no strong odor or stink from either flavor. Most importantly, the cat is no longer diabetic after 3 months eating Ziwi wet cat food! His blood glucose has gone from the 500 range down to 75-100 now with no insulin! We will continue to feed him Ziwi to maintain these splendid glucose levels.
customer_reviews.author: z0nda

customer_reviews.title: WINNER!!
customer_reviews.text: ZiewiPeak is the answer to our cat's dietary needs. He's always had problem with keeping weight on along with skin and allergic reactions to food. ZiwiPeak has made it possible for our little to have a normal weight and enjoy eating again! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Unsatisfied

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a little off; chicken-loving cat would not eat
customer_reviews.text: The ingredient list looks good, but my cat would not eat this. She normally loves chicken. It looked very slightly off color around the edges. So subtle it's hard to say. I tried about 3 cans, then threw it away. Won't be getting again and don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: High quality and satisfaction with my kitties who prefer dry food diet, but will wanna eat it all immediately with nothing left. I assume it’s got Good nutrition and taste, because my cats have been doing well with this brand. It doesn’t have a Fishy smell that would stink the room like some of other competitor brands out there. The only thing is that the patte gets very dense and sticky like a cheesecake under room temp, so it is a little easier to cut in pieces when refrigerated.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Young

customer_reviews.title: Wired dry one
customer_reviews.text: It's supposed to be wet and fresh. This one smells wired and comes out in bulks. I opened two of them, both are like this.
customer_reviews.author: chenleye

customer_reviews.title: First of all, I admit my cats are fussy.
customer_reviews.text: This is expensive cat food and I ordered it because of the reviews and because one of my three cats has bladder issues. Problem is that none of my cats like it. It's not a smooth consistency, kind of like pieces of meat and not juicy. The cans are larger than those usually sold in the USA. I won't be buying it again because my cats won't eat it. As far as rating flavor...I really can't say because I'm not about to taste the food.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley A. Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Hit and miss
customer_reviews.text: I choose a different flavor daily so they don't get bored with the same food every day. I was surprised to find that my cats preferred the lamb & Mackerel to the plain Lamb. But still, they will eat it some mornings and not others. They disliked the Beef entirely. Their all-time favorite is Venison. The pet store in town sells the cans separately so I can buy one can and, if the cats like it, I'll buy the case on Amazon, whose prices are better. I will try the chicken next.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. E.

customer_reviews.title: the food is great but i've ordered canned beef for my cat twice ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not about the food, the food is great but i've ordered canned beef for my cat twice and they keep sending me canned rabbit and lamb. I didn't have anymore beef and had to give my cat the rabbit and lamb. Now she's sick and has diarrhea because I couldn't change her food properly. I don't have store that sells this so i'm at the mercy of online ordering. Not sure how to make my kitty's tummy feel better!
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Best food I can find online
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this cat food, other than the chick peas. I wish it was 100% meat, which is a natural cat diet. Also, it's expensive enough to be 100% meat. Other than that, it's great. The stuff is sourced from NZ, and it's clean. It's hard to find clean cat food that I feel good about. My cats love it. They have their favorites; lamb & mackerel and hoki. If introducing a new flavor, first mix it with the cat's usual food until they adjust. Pretty soon, if they like it at all, they'll be gobbling it up by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Savitri

customer_reviews.title: Very healthy but my cat refused it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure many cats like this food but mine refused to eat it. I gave it to my friend and her cat also would not eat it. I wish the opposite were true because it's such a healthy food.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Ardoin

customer_reviews.title: Pieces of Bone in Food
customer_reviews.text: I had previously bought this brand in another flavor from Chewy.com, but decided to get my next batch of cans from Amazon in chicken flavor. Now, my cat won't even finish his wet food (which he used to be obsessed with) because there are literally chunks of bone all throughout that at first he spit out, and now, he just won't touch once the food gets to that part. It's so disappointing at this price point especially to have large sharp chunks of bone that my cat not only hates, but also could choke on. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: vera

customer_reviews.title: Solved my cat's diarrhea problems!
customer_reviews.text: My cat had chronic diarrhea. I switched from a chicken-based cat food to a salmon and tuna cat food. Diarrhea got worse. I didn't know what to think. She was losing weight. By chance, when I took her to the vet they gave her some of your Ziwi beef recipe while they were drawing blood for tests. She gobbled it up. When she got home, she had a solid bowel movement! I ordered some right away! She has been a happy camper ever since. Who knew?
customer_reviews.author: Ms. H.

customer_reviews.title: Cat dove right in!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has started losing interest in his raw food, so I was looking for something "clean" to offer him instead. We've been through a lot of the usual high-end brands (weruva, etc) and he usually just licks the broth off of things. This is a pate, and when I put it down for him, he dove right in. Happy to have something he actually likes in the rotation. Roger gives it a 10/10 so far.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: Great nutrition, cats hate it
customer_reviews.text: Cats really hate thisx even chicken stock wouldnt convince them. They've never hated a catfood this much.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Dole

customer_reviews.title: none of my cats will eat it
customer_reviews.text: this food is very expensive and I bought it because of the healthy ingredients nonetheless. However, none of my cats will eat it. So 1 star for that reason. It looks like really good quality food and worth it if they will eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: The cats clear the plate.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best flavor and quality I've found and I've bought numerous brands from pet stores. It's not the cheapest but I want the best ingredients for my cats and a flavor they will consistently eat. I give them a good variety but this can is guaranteed to be eaten with none thrown away. I put out half at a time. If you take no waste into account I call it a value. If you always throw half the food out because your cat won't eat it then that doubles the price you paid for it without the benefit that the healthy ingrdients provide. 5 stars easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cat food. It speaks to the obligate carnivore preferences of cats without any bad chemicals or plant products. Our cat loves his Lamb and Mackeral. He devours it. If you’re interested in Ziwi Peak, I would make a couple of suggestions: first, if your cat prefers fish flavours, get one with fish in it. Bob didn’t like the non fish flavours. Also, really take your time transitioning onto the food to give kitty time to adjust. This food has been great for Bob’s digestion and dandruff.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: My Maine Coone acts years younger again
customer_reviews.text: My 12yr old Maine Coone was overweight and lazy, so the vet told me to getting him off dry food. He also has a mild skin irritation (vet said environmental cause) but I chose venison to try and solve both. This food made the change over flawless, the skin problem is not cured but better, and he is loosing the weight..........The best part is he is now acting like a younger cat. He is much more active and playful again. He has become talkative (welcome home, feed me), and my protector is back on duty.....all in all positive results.....the downside..it's pricey
customer_reviews.author: D. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Instant favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This was a clear winner. I’ve never had my two cats instantly take to any wet food like they took to this. One can is enough to divide between them (they get dry food in the morning and some snacks during the day). They are gobbling this down. They loved Nutro Max but unfortunately that product line was discontinued. I have tried a lot of other varieties, but none was met with enthusiasm. Until I found this. It’s expensive, but not having to throw most of it away makes it worth it. As for the quality, I just hope it’s made under the high standards the company claims to adhere to.
customer_reviews.author: Patrizia

customer_reviews.title: Not the solution to my cat's digestion issues.
customer_reviews.text: My cad has IBD, and some of the reviews alluded to this food helping with digestion issues, but alas it did not help my cat. I switched to another prescription food that she doesn't like as much but has helped the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nothing, no Cats no raccoons ,No wildlife will touch it!
customer_reviews.text: Not one of my cats would touch it! I feel a lot of strays and none of the strays even touched it and they were hungry. I’m sorry but I have to say it was a horrible experience but thanks to Amazon they refunded my money. I did extensive research and I finally caved in and I still have 10 cans left and nothing will eat it. Not even the raccoons!
customer_reviews.author: Visitor

customer_reviews.title: My car don’t like it
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered the same flavor in Chewy before, and my cat like it! But when I order the same flavor from Amazon, he won’t even take a bite?! I don’t know if the same brand same flavor what Amazon offer is different from what Chewy offer?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: I think it is FAKE Ziwi!
customer_reviews.text: I am really hoping I can get a refund. I splurged and bought 24 cans for around $71. At first my cats wouldn’t eat it so I mixed it with the brand they’d been eating. Still no luck. Tried again a few days later and they both puked- badly. I won’t give the gory details. Then I gave a can to a STRAY, and the stray wouldn’t even touch it. Tried one last time this morning and my tabby threw up 8 times. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Thompson (public)

customer_reviews.title: great food
customer_reviews.text: My old cat is wasting away, won't eat most of the time, but he devours this stuff and of course I like the quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wright

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it. They need less brushing
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it. They need less brushing, so they are grooming better. They are 17 to 10 years old, so quality food is important to their health.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: All three of my cats love the rabbit and lamb
customer_reviews.text: All three of my cats love the rabbit and lamb. I add a couple of tablespoons of water to help keep them hydrated. The ingredients are better than almost any other cat food available now. I trust it. One can feeds all three cats for one meal, so I use two cans a day.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: I was a little hesitant that my cat wouldn't like the flavor considering he has had chicken for every ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant that my cat wouldn't like the flavor considering he has had chicken for every version of food (dry, wet, freeze dried, even treats) but he loved the taste of this! And it isn't such a packed patte that looks gross and artificial. It looks like real food. My cat loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lucerne

customer_reviews.title: Large Bone Shards
customer_reviews.text: There are large bone shards throughout this food. I noticed because my cat would spit them out around her food bowl. This seems extremely dangerous and unacceptable for the price point of this supposedly high quality food.
customer_reviews.author: C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients, cat hates this kind
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients in this are absolutely amazing. I accidentally bought the venison once because I could not find something my cat could eat, everything gave her an allergic reaction. She loved that. Switched to lamb because I'm a young, broke person and it's like $20 bucks cheaper, and she absolutely refuses to touch it. I'm maybe managing to get her to eat half a can a day at best, and only if i put dry food in it that makes her sick but she likes. I've used three cans trying to do this and so I can't return it, but she hates this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla T

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my cats don't love it. In addition, all of the cans came dented.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: My cat is sick because of this can!!
customer_reviews.text: I regret to purchase this! After this, my cat is sick and i paid $700 to my vet. We checked x-ray. this food was stuck in my cat's stomach & intestine. No easy to digestive at all because of ingredient! So bad experience!
customer_reviews.author: sangjin han

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the dog will like it
customer_reviews.text: My cat are not picky when it comes to food. They’ve eaten everything that I’ve given for the past year... they won’t go near this. I tried heating it up. And adding water. I added some of their old wet food and they just picked through it. I’m gonna donate it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruquta

customer_reviews.title: Everyone is satisfied with a 1/4 portion and in the evening they ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel confident providing this food to my cats. It's is worth the money! It's the only food I find is perfectly balanced & nutritious. I split one can a day by 4 in the morning. Everyone is satisfied with a 1/4 portion and in the evening they get kibble. No empty carbs or starch. Using this food & sound wave therapy cured my one cat of bladder stones without surgery!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: The Louis Vuitton in cat foods
customer_reviews.text: Friends with cats all recommended me this. Two months into having a cat, I can really tell the difference between this and other cheap cat foods. My cat really love this. Happy to see her being well-fed and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: em1130

customer_reviews.title: Looks good to me but my cats don't really like it
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the company making wholesome cat food with great ingredients. With that said, at the end of the day, it will be my cats who will decide if they like it or not. My male cat isn't a picky eater and my female cat is really picky. For the Lamb, he will eat a bit before trying to bury it. My female cat won't touch it. With the Mackerel, he automatically tries to bury it and again my female cat won't touch it.
customer_reviews.author: WAiTU

customer_reviews.title: Waste of expensive food.
customer_reviews.text: Lamb formula is not good. Not sure of the ingredients but this food makes my cat vomit every single time I "try it again"... Ingredients are good but, a waste of expensive food. I had to throw the remaining case of cans away. FYI the mackerel formula seems to be ok, my cat enjoys the food. Anyone else have the same result with the Lamb Formula?? Note to ZIWI: IS THIS A BAD BATCH??
customer_reviews.author: RMR

customer_reviews.title: My cats won't eat it....
customer_reviews.text: My 2 cats tried it once....ate some of it....and never got near it again. So expensive -- and seems healthy...but even if I mix it with their fav flavor of another brand, they sniff and walk away. Oh well. I'll donate it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie J.

customer_reviews.title: great quality, grass fed meat
customer_reviews.text: I am a cat only vet. I keep searching for healthy cat foods. This is one of the best I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Michele L. Paul

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I found many small bone fragments in this food! They are sharp and can cause serious internal damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 0 for 4-cat taste test results
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my rescue kitty who has food allergies. Neither she nor my other cat would eat it. “My” 2 ferals wouldn’t eat it. And I didn’t like the smell either. Attempts to mix with other food failed.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: i ordered ziwipeak Hoki and i received Mackerel
customer_reviews.text: very good food, our cat loves it. we have oredered almost every flavor but when we orderd the Hoki we got the Mackerel delivered to us even after we called to tell them Amazon that when you looked at the details of Hoki it had mackerel. And when we clicked on Mackerel the details had Hoki so the representative told us that we would get the Hoki. we just want them to make it right for us. She loves the Mackerel so we will not be returning it. very happy customers just a little dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Insco

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good quality but cat ate them, but seems to prefer chunky style food
customer_reviews.text: I can’t criticize the quality but the cat didn’t love these (though she ate them) I think she just prefers chunky style food.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: despite high price tag
customer_reviews.text: the cat does not like the food while she eats another wet food. It is practically useless.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Good food.
customer_reviews.text: Great food, the price is very high. I would like to see the price go down.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good brand and l have purchased products form this brand for a long time. It has good quality and natural meat. but my cat does not like this flavor very much.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Ziwi Cat food - Lamb
customer_reviews.text: It's not you, it's Kitty. She started out really liking this product, but grew tired of it after a couple of days. Which makes me sad b/c I bought a case.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and it smells great
customer_reviews.text: My cats are picky and they always likes to eat super healthy food that other cats refuse to eat :D They adore this one.
customer_reviews.author: C. D

customer_reviews.title: Mine wouldn’t eat at all
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure it’s good quality but mine won’t touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: If you want the best wet cat food....here it is .
customer_reviews.text: If you can afford it ...best cat food around. It's the real deal. I bought in beef and lamb. She DEVOURS it! Much more substantial than other wet food. Try it and you will not go back.
customer_reviews.author: howard lacey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cat food
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic cat food. I've gone through a few brands and this is by far the best in terms of quality, consistency and my cat loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: good but pricey
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this but it is quite pricey. I found it cheaper elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Meema

customer_reviews.title: Looks yummy! But...
customer_reviews.text: My cats would not eat it and neither would my neighbor’s. I hate that I buy food that I think is healthy and they won’t touch it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great for all cats
customer_reviews.text: My cats both love this food, and normally what one likes the other dislikes. So I think this is great for a finicky cat. It seems very high quality to me, too. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Mae Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Kiki likes it!
customer_reviews.text: When my cat likes it and the ingredients are healthy, that's what I look for. I found it with ZIWI wet cat food.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisper

customer_reviews.title: Meow delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves this food. It is a staple in her diet. Considering what you get, the price is pretty reasonble. Great job Ziwipeak.
customer_reviews.author: Professor X

customer_reviews.title: Made my cat sick!
customer_reviews.text: At first, my cat ate it when I mixed it in with his old food. I gave it to him for dinner and then breakfast, then he vomited a lot later that day.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Steitz

customer_reviews.title: Severe and immediate allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: Just received the beef flavor today, but unfortunately my cat had a violent reaction it and vomited repeatedly. He did seem to like the flavor but must be allergic to one of the ingredients. Ate my old brand without a reaction later in the evening. This was an expensive experiment.
customer_reviews.author: Sandankyo

customer_reviews.title: Picky eater?
customer_reviews.text: This is the food for your cats. Really good for cats with pancreatitis. My cat is now in the recovery zone...Thank you Ziwi!
customer_reviews.author: Tania Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive
customer_reviews.text: I could feed my cat tuna fish with water for .69 a can, this stuff is almost $2.00 a can, and it smells horrible. My cat eats it as a treat, but I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Koleszar

customer_reviews.title: Finicky Bengal loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s so convenient... i usually rehydrate freeze dried raw ( we also use their bagged cat food- the beef smells like prime rib when i add hot water to it!) but when I’m away or forgot to rehydrate these really cone in handy! And i know they’re using clean ingredients!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A Ackermann

customer_reviews.title: Kitty didn't like. He likes raw lamb instead.
customer_reviews.text: Well the ingredients looked great to me. But Kitty wasn't crazy about it. Disappointed. Thank you Amazon for giving me a refund. Cans will be donated to local cat shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Margie L

customer_reviews.title: My kitten refuse to eat this
customer_reviews.text: My kitten refuse to eat this...Personally, I feel it smells bad.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaoxian H.

customer_reviews.title: Good nutrition, expensive
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love it but it’s getting expensive with both of them on it now.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Ortega

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this cat food and is visibly more ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this cat food and is visibly more energetic, whereas I noticed fancy feast made her rather lethargic. You can definitely smell the freshness in comparison to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the healthiest and best of all the flavors for a cat
customer_reviews.text: the healthiest and best of all the flavors for a cat, you get about three meals in this large can for two cats.(6) servings, along with whatever dry food you serve
customer_reviews.author: Kim L.

customer_reviews.title: My cat threw up everything she ate the first time ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat threw up everything she ate the first time I gave it to her. Any suggestions? I have 11 1/2 cans left and I do not know if I should keep giving her this food.
customer_reviews.author: Riren

customer_reviews.title: Cat doesn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: My cat seems dislike this. Maybe goat is too advanced for her.
customer_reviews.author: Qsinman

customer_reviews.title: So glad they make chicken now!
customer_reviews.text: Her Highness only eats Ziwi Peak canned food, the "gold standard," but I was cooking chicken & turkey for her because cats need to eat poultry. She loves this. Thank you. We miss the Rabbit....
customer_reviews.author: May11

customer_reviews.title: Be careful what you pry this many things I'll turn cheaper and better
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff Bud my dog that are my cat didn't like it at hand just too overpriced
customer_reviews.author: mark ramey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product with an apparently great taste-my cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product with an apparently great taste-my cat loves it. He has a sensitive stomach and needs clean hralthy food. This fits the bill-no carageenan,Perfect. no BSP in can lining.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: SONS CATS LOVE THIS ITEM AND HEALTHY
customer_reviews.text: HEALTHY FOR YOUR CAT HARD TO FIND CATS LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.author: CARCAT

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my youngest cat's very favorite and is pretty close to raw. Great product. Cat is healthy and her fur is soft & shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Irving

customer_reviews.title: My 3 cats absolutely love the new formula and so do I
customer_reviews.text: My 3 cats absolutely love the new formula and so do I. There is nothing that can harm your cat, literally nothing. Thank you Ziwipeak for FINALLY creating a formula that is 100% healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent really great food for your beautiful and loving cat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent really great food for your beautiful and loving cat! So nice that you can still find something that won't kill them!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Williams

customer_reviews.title: Happy cats, happier cat Mom
customer_reviews.text: Cats gobble it up and I love the ingredients list! Switched to this from Wellness, haven't looked back.
customer_reviews.author: G. Host

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it, I just can’t afford to buy it for them regularly
customer_reviews.author: Reno

customer_reviews.title: My kitten loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this food. My kitten has a small appetite but she would beg for a can.
customer_reviews.author: greghsu

customer_reviews.title: We love it, our cats not.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and this came up as one of the top wet cat foods. But both our cats don't like it at all... We tried over and over again. Pity... As it seems like excellent quality cat food.
customer_reviews.author: Wim

customer_reviews.title: It looks good for cats I guess
customer_reviews.text: my cats aren't really into this but they will eat it if I don't give them anything else...It looks good for cats I guess...Lots of meaty looking stuff in it..smells ok too...just hoping they will learn to like it...
customer_reviews.author: tari

customer_reviews.title: Cats didn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I tried it but ultimately my cats didn’t care for the flavor. We did a gradual introduction so the change was not a surprise but they never really took to it - consistently left large portions unfinished.
customer_reviews.author: McMommy

customer_reviews.title: cat sniffed  walked away
customer_reviews.text: cat wouldn't even touch it I myself did not taste it.
customer_reviews.author: valerie hyatt

customer_reviews.title: I gave it 4 star because it looks like good food
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my cats for dinner...They are not into it...they will eat their crunchies around it...I gave it 4 star because it looks like good food...I just think they are not into the flavor ....
customer_reviews.author: tari

customer_reviews.title: but the ingredients are great and I trust the company
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it. It is more expensive than other food, but the ingredients are great and I trust the company.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothee Burney

customer_reviews.title: cats like it!
customer_reviews.text: My cats like this one.. I have one who is pretty fussy and he likes it. The one one will eat anything, so, no worries. Seems to be good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Claude Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: That's part of a cat's natural diet This canned food is fantastic. Read the list of ingredients
customer_reviews.text: By the way, none fragments are supposed to be in food! That's part of a cat's natural diet This canned food is fantastic. Read the list of ingredients. Top 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A real case of you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES this food..expensive yes ..is there something better? It's real meat..not started down meat. Open a can and you will " get it"
customer_reviews.author: howard lacey

customer_reviews.title: Great as a novel protein
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a novel protein option for cat with inflammatory bowel disease. It is definitely helping.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Hart

customer_reviews.title: canned but dry like sawdust
customer_reviews.text: product is dry like saw dust... cats wont touch it brown stuff in bottom of can looks burnt
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The ingredients listed looked good so I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Amazon does not provide an ingredient list so I checked ZiwiPeaks website. The ingredients listed looked good so I ordered. However the ingredients listed on the cans I received were not as advertised!! I am especially disappointed that this food contains carrageenan which is not listed online.
customer_reviews.author: catnip

customer_reviews.title: Cat seems iffy about it
customer_reviews.text: My cat is not picky but she wouldn't even try this. She just pawed at it and went back to her dry food. After depriving her dry food, she reluctantly ate it but now seems content with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tricks for food....
customer_reviews.text: Greatest canned cat food...bar none. My cat does circus tricks whenever he hears me open the tab on a can. Also well made with natural ingredients...
customer_reviews.author: wireman

product_meta.title: ZIWI Peak Wet Cat Food - Natural High Protein, Grain Free, Limited Ingredient Recipes
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Venison| Size:3 oz - Case of 24Ziwi is a small team whose love for our cats is pure and simple, just like our recipes. We put the best of New Zealand into our authentic farm-to-bowl products. Ziwi recipes uses fresh meat, organs and bone to mirror a whole-prey, nutrient dense diet. To keep the formula as natural as possible, we do not include TSPP, BPA or Carrageenan in any of our canned products. Calorie Content (calculated) - 1200 kcal ME/kg | 222 kcal ME/185g can | 102 kcal ME/85g can
feature_bullets: MIMICKING MOTHER NATURE: High-protein recipes that never include added fillers, sugars, glycerins, artifical preservatives, gums, or BPA

ETHICAL AND SUSTAINABLE: 100% ethically and sustainably sourced meats and seafoods from New Zealand's free-range farms and pristine blue waters with no added hormones, antibiotics, or growth promotants
SUPERFOOD INCLUSIONS: All recipes include 7% Tripe and 3% New Zealand Green Mussels, which are a natural source of chondroitin and glucosamine that supports joint health.
MAY HELP PROMOTE: Allergy relief, healthy skin and coat, improved digestion, joint health and mobility, weight maintenance
GREAT FOR PICKY EATERS: Made as a chunky loaf style, with a high level of all-natural protein and moisture to entice even the pickiest eater.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
